name: Sakib Rahman
bio: Sakib is a seasoned chef with a passion for creating delicious and healthy meals. He specializes in Bangladeshi cuisine and has won numerous awards for his unique recipes.

recipe.name: Chicken Curry
cooking_method: In a large pot or wok, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onion and fry until golden brown, stirring occasionally.
Add the ginger paste, garlic paste, and slit green chilies to the pot and fry for another 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.
Add the chicken pieces to the pot and stir to coat with the onion and spice mixture.
Add the turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, chili powder, and salt to the pot and stir well to combine.
Pour in the water and bring the curry to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 30-35 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
Garnish with chopped fresh coriander leaves before serving. Serve hot with steamed rice or flatbread.
